titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Policy and Planning
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Policy and Planning FA1700

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-11-01 04:58:28 -0400.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Policy and Planning

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists primarily of office files as well as records of McCloy Committee, the Gaither Commission and the Ford Foundation Special Committee for Program Policy Review.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by committee, or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.
